snippet: Sergio Agüero’s second-half goal earned host Manchester City a 1-0 victory over 10-man Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester City defeats Manchester United, 1-0; other soccer scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sergio Agüero’s second-half goal earned host Manchester City a 1-0 victory over 10-man Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.

headline.main: Manchester City Continues Hot Streak Against United
headline.print_headline: Manchester City Continues Hot Streak Against United
